introduction.title: Hi, I'm Yunis.
introduction.detail: Currently, I'm engaged in the development of the frontend of websites using modern technologies.

skills.title: Skills
skills.detail: I mainly use these technologies for projects.
skills.detail_plus: These modern technologies will provide you with a fast and advanced experience.

projects.detail: Check out my latest projects that showcase my skills and expertise in web development.

project_1.title: Edumy
project_1.detail: Edumy offers a modern online course platform using innovative technologies. A site created with React library has add to cart, sorting, form validations, pagination and many other features. In addition, technologies such as Tailwindcss, Redux Toolkit, EmailJS, Framer-motion, Formik and Yup were used.

testimonial_1.rate: Dear Yunis, good luck in your future endeavors. Looking forward to working with you. Your skills and yourself are seriously amazing.

testimonial_2.rate: Yunis is my most educated, smartest, most well-educated personality and student. I am proud that a Lion passed through my life and you cannot be forgotten. You are my brand student.

testimonial_3.rate: He is one of the most knowledgeable and hard working developers I have ever met. I have no doubt that he will succeed.

testimonial_4.rate: Yunis, he is skilled and very hardworking. I think he would be a great developer for teamwork. The sites he writes are modern and look great. Good luck in your future career!

testimonial_5.rate: Patience and knowledge are the two most important things for a developer. You have both of them. Everyone will see it not as a word, but as a result in projects!

footer.detail: Copyright © 2023 Yunis Aslanov. All rights reserved.

aboutme.title: Hi again, I'm Yunis.
aboutme.paragraph_1: I'm a front-end JavaScript developer with a strong focus on React. I enjoy working, learning new technologies and developing projects. I am someone who is passionate and ambitious about this work. I am ready to perform high quality work with consistency and perseverance, for you.
aboutme.paragraph_2: Currently, I work as a freelancer and study as a second-year student at Azerbaijan Technical University.
aboutme.paragraph_3: Outside of development, I love reading books and listening to different styles of music. I also enjoy spending time with my friends.
